Tue, 07 Jan 2025 02:42:11 +0000 DoC is calling for public assistance in locating an entangled bottlenose dolphin reported in waters around western Auckland. Photo / DoC
Oxford baby death: Mother accused of neglect named for first time https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oxford-baby-death-mother-accused-of-neglect-named-for-first-time/XXR4SJLWWZGQZKKWC6NBFYQQEE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oxford-baby-death-mother-accused-of-neglect-named-for-first-time/XXR4SJLWWZGQZKKWC6NBFYQQEE/ Kurt BayerTwo-month-old Kevin Chen died on August 5. Tue, 07 Jan 2025 02:34:07 +0000 Michael Steele with his son Kevin Chen, who died suddenly four months ago. Steele is now demanding answers after saying he raised red flags with Oranga Tamariki before the tragedy.

Niwa analysis: Just how much colder has 2025 been where you live in NZ? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/niwa-analysis-just-how-much-colder-has-2025-been-where-you-live-in-nz/DJ6GJQBWWNH2BPYKFMV3FB23JU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/niwa-analysis-just-how-much-colder-has-2025-been-where-you-live-in-nz/DJ6GJQBWWNH2BPYKFMV3FB23JU/ Jamie MortonWe all know it's been colder around NZ over 2025. But how cold? Here are the numbers. Tue, 07 Jan 2025 02:08:00 +0000 Auckland's Waitemata Harbour on Sunday. Temperatures around New Zealand have averaged several degrees below normal amid an unsummer-like southerly flow. Photo / Hayden Woodward
